description: Presenting the first study aid app for the on-the-go IBM database administrator!  *  Whether you are taking the IBM DB2 Family Fundamentals exam or want to refresh your memory for DB2  DBA or Application Developer certifications, this IBM DB2 Palm webOS flash card app from Upward Mobility provides 475 important vocabulary terms with clear and concise explanations and definitions.  Applicable to both DB2 v8.1 and v9.  *  Our flash card app has simple, intuitive navigation, with the ability to shuffle cards, to remove flash cards from the deck, and to reset the deck.  *  Vocabulary Topics include: DB2 Products, Planning, Security, Databases and Database Objects, Using SQL, Tables, Data Types, Views and Indexes, and Data Concurrency  ||  This app is the ideal on-the-go study aid for the busy database professional!  ||   Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
